sentences.en: a particular type of food
sentences.cn: 某一类食品

sentences.en: Drew made some remarks to nobody in particular and said goodbye.
sentences.cn: 德鲁说了一些不针对任何人的话就告辞了。

sentences.en: For further particulars , contact the College secretary.
sentences.cn: 欲了解详情，请与学院秘书联系。

sentences.en: For no particular reason , he quit the job.
sentences.cn: 没有什么特别原因他就辞了工作。

sentences.en: He responded very strongly to the aesthetic of this particular work.
sentences.cn: 他强烈地感受到这件作品的美学价值。

sentences.en: He stares detachedly into the middle distance, towards nothing in particular.
sentences.cn: 他漠然而漫无目标地注视着不远处。

sentences.en: He was not a fit companion for their skipper that particular morning.
sentences.cn: 那天早晨，他没能和队长配合好。

sentences.en: I have a particular responsibility to ensure I make the right decision.
sentences.cn: 我肩负特殊责任，必须确保自己作出的决定是正确的。

sentences.en: I read Germaine Greer's article in the March issue with particular interest.
sentences.cn: 我饶有兴致地阅读了杰曼·格里尔在三月那期发表的文章。

sentences.en: In particular I admire Gary Lineker.
sentences.cn: 我特别崇拜加里·莱因克尔。

sentences.en: In this particular case, no one else was involved.
sentences.cn: 这件事没有其他人牵涉其中。

sentences.en: Marty’s very particular about his food.
sentences.cn: 马蒂对食物很挑剔。

sentences.en: Most students choose one particular area for research.
sentences.cn: 大多数学生选择一个特定领域进行研究。

sentences.en: Prices range from $119 to $199, depending on the particular configuration.
sentences.cn: 价格因具体配置而异，从119美元至199美元不等。

sentences.en: Send your particulars (= details such as your name, address, profession etc ) to the address above.
sentences.cn: 请将个人资料寄往上述地址。

sentences.en: Ted was very particular about the colors he used.
sentences.cn: 特德在用色上非常讲究。

sentences.en: The chemical structure of this particular molecule is very unusual.
sentences.cn: 这个特殊分子的化学结构很不寻常。

sentences.en: The police haven't really done anything for the black community in particular.
sentences.cn: 警方并未真正特意为黑人群体做什么.

sentences.en: The situation in Ethiopia in particular is worrying.
sentences.cn: 埃塞俄比亚的局势尤其令人担忧。

sentences.en: This particular model has a further refinement.
sentences.cn: 这一款式又有了进一步的改进。

sentences.en: We are taught to construe these terms in a particular way.
sentences.cn: 我们被教导要以特定的方式理解这些词语。

sentences.en: Why should he notice her car in particular?
sentences.cn: 他为什么会特别注意到她的车？

sentences.en: You should pay particular attention to spelling.
sentences.cn: 你应该特别注意拼写。

words.tran_cn: 特别地，独特地；详细地，具体地；明确地，细致地
特殊神宠论；完全忠于一种理论

phrases.tran_cn: 在一切方面；每一项；每一点
过分讲究的；难以取悦的

trans.tran_cn: 特定的，特殊的，格外的，挑剔的
trans.tran_en: a particular thing or person is the one that you are talking about, and not any other
the facts and details about a job, property, legal case etc
